meanings.definition: To give back or return something that was previously given.
meanings.sent1: She regiving the book to the library.
meanings.sent2: He regiving the toy to his friend after borrowing it.
meanings.sent3: The teacher regiving the homework assignment for the third time.
meanings.sent4: The river regiving the water to the thirsty plants along its banks.
meanings.sent5: The kind gesture of regiving the lost wallet made her day.

meanings.definition: The act of giving again or repeatedly.
meanings.sent1: Her regiving of gifts during the holidays is heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: The regiving of presents at the party brought joy to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The regiving of compliments made him blush with happiness.
meanings.sent4: The regiving of love and care in the family is priceless.
meanings.sent5: The regiving of smiles brightened up the room.
